component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.Frame
component-description.description: A frame support influencing of his subtree, find of subframes, activate- and deactivate-mechanism as well as set/get of a frame window, component or controller.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.Desktop
component-description.description: A desktop environment contains tasks with one or more frames in which components can be loaded. The desktop himself is the root of the frame hierarchy.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.DocumentProperties
component-description.description: This service grants access to document-specific information, like the author, creation date and user fields, directly from document files without loading the whole document.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.URLTransformer
component-description.description: Helps to split up a string containing a URL into its structural parts and assembles the parts into a single string.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.JobExecutor
component-description.description: It implements a generic job execution service, which can start registered uno services on triggered events, control her lifetime and handle there own configuration.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.SoundHandler
component-description.description: Implements a handler service to detect and/or play audio files. supported formats: wav/au

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.DispatchRecorderSupplier
component-description.description: This supplier is available on the servcice Frame as property "DispatchRecorderSupplier". It provides access on the currently set DispatchRecorder of this Frame and some additional functionality to make macro recording easy.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.DispatchRecorder
component-description.description: Implements a recorder object which can record XDIspatch::dispatch() calls and generate basic script code from that.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.MailToDispatcher
component-description.description: It's a dispatch object which can handle "mailto:" URLs. This service is registered in configuration for this protocol and wil be used automaticly by the generic dispatch implementation of a Frame. It should start an external mail application and forward this request to it.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.ServiceHandler
component-description.description: It's a special dispatch object which is registered for "service:*" URL pattern and will be automaticly used by the framework dispatch mechanism if such URL occured. His job is to create any registered uno components which must be coded inside dispatched URL (may with some optional given parameters). After that such created service must be hold his self alive. Such mechanism can be usefull for UI components (e.g. Dialogs, Wizards) only.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.JobHandler
component-description.description: It's a special dispatch object which is registered for "vnd.sun.star.job:*" URL pattern and will be automaticly used by the framework dispatch mechanism if such URL occured. It binds the dispatch mechanism to the generic job execution of this framework module. That can be used for e.g. addon purposes.
